item.title: Pointing the Way to Serverless Python
item.description: 3 Reasons Why Waypoint Consistent developer experience over bespoke scripting A central UI for understanding who did what when Spend more time writing code vs deploying code 3 Reasons Why Google Cloud Run The simplest way to get your code live and accessible on the cloud Containers give you high levels of environmental consistency, no more “works on my machine”
